result.arabic_text: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
result.translation: 40. Wonna hinnay Qhiyaamá garciik (hurubbaak) keenit tamaateeh, ken wariggissaah kaxxam Qabaxxaagitaanaah baditaanah, tokkel sinni nafsik digaala gutqaanam maduudaanaay woo saaku dagoh gide ken mawaddiroysan yatoobeenimkeh.
